org.osgi.service.remoteservices.admin
Interface RemoteServiceAdminListener

public interface RemoteServiceAdminListener

A Remote Service Admin Listener is notified asynchronously of any export or import registrations and unregistrations.

Method Summary
 void addExport(ExportRegistration reg)
          Add an export registration.
 void addImport(ImportRegistration reg)
          Add an import registration.
 void removeExport(ExportRegistration reg)
          Remove an export registration.
 void removeImport(ImportRegistration reg)
          Remove an export registration.
 

Method Detail

addImport

void addImport(ImportRegistration reg)
Add an import registration. The Remote Services Admin will call this method when it imports a service. When this service is registered, the Remote Service Admin must notify the listener of all existing Import Registrations.

Parameters:
reg - The associated import registration

addExport

void addExport(ExportRegistration reg)
Add an export registration. The Remote Services Admin will call this method when it exports a service. When this service is registered, the Remote Service Admin must notify the listener of all existing Export Registrations.

Parameters:
reg - The associated export registration

removeExport

void removeExport(ExportRegistration reg)
Remove an export registration. The Remote Services Admin will call this method when it removes the export of a service.

Parameters:
reg - The associated export registration

removeImport

void removeImport(ImportRegistration reg)
Remove an export registration. The Remote Services Admin will call this method when it removes the import of a service.

Parameters:
reg - The associated import registration
